name: Green Shirt (Guulamog)
description:
A platformer following a humanoid creature clad in a bright green shirt.

In this game you will fall, suffer, face defeat after defeat, your death counter will climb, and your hope...plummet. You may get far, but you will only face worse obstacles. There will be no mercy, and no forgiveness. The only faces you'll meet on this journey will be full of silent mockery.  In the end you have no choice but to crumble.

But on the bright side...

You've got a green shirt.
